item.title: CNCJ - June, 2020
item.description: [Kubernetes] A demo of Rancher’s RKE Summary Bradley Cloete gave us a glimpse into the power and simplicity of Rancher’s RKE. RKE’s easy Kubernetes life cycle management is a breeze for novice and experts alike. Bradley showed us how Kubernetes’ day 2 operations (cluster backup/restore/scale) can be straightforward with RKE.
